类 SocketConnectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.darkphoenixs.pool.socket.SocketConnectionFactory
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, PooledObjectFactory<Socket>, ConnectionFactory<Socket>

     class SocketConnectionFactory
extends Object
implements ConnectionFactory<Socket>

    1.2.1

      • SocketConnectionFactory

        public SocketConnectionFactory(Properties properties)
        参数:
        properties - 连接属性

      • SocketConnectionFactory

        public SocketConnectionFactory(String host,
                       int port,
                       int receiveBufferSize,
                       int sendBufferSize,
                       int connectionTimeout,
                       int soTimeout,
                       int linger,
                       boolean keepAlive,
                       boolean tcpNoDelay,
                       String[] performance)
        参数:
        host - 地址
        port - 端口
        receiveBufferSize - 接收缓存大小
        sendBufferSize - 发送缓存大小
        connectionTimeout - 连接超时
        soTimeout - 接收超时
        linger - 逗留时间
        keepAlive - 保持活动
        tcpNoDelay - 不延迟
        performance - 性能属性
